name: funmpt2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wfun(c0)
-| wfun(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
-| wb(wfun(c0), wfun(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Fun(c0)
⊣ Fun((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
⊣ (Fun(c0)↔ Fun((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfun(c0)
-| wfun(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
-| wb(wfun(c0), wfun(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Fun(c0)
⊣ Fun((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
⊣ (Fun(c0)↔ Fun((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wfun(c0), wfun(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))

comment: Functionality of a class given by a maps-to notation. (Contributed by FL, 17-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2014.)
